data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of North Tripura, Tripura, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of North Tripura, Tripura, India

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of North Tripura.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 7,633 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, help the 7,633 believers in North Tripura to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 686,267 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Marma people might believe through him.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of North Tripura to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in North Tripura, Tripura, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary:
the county of North Tripura, Tripura, India has a population of 693,900.

We estimate North Tripura has 7,633 people who might know Jesus, 8,419 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 677,848 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 7,633 believers in the county of North Tripura the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
